alert.note: Alert for New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:08PM EST until further notice by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Connecticut...Massachusetts...Rhode Island... Farmington River At Simsbury affecting Hartford County. Sudbury River At Saxonville affecting Middlesex County. Blackstone River At Northbridge affecting Worcester County. Blackstone River At Woonsocket affecting Providence and Worcester Counties. Neponset River At Norwood affecting Norfolk and Suffolk Counties. Pawcatuck River At Westerly affecting Washington and New London Counties. Taunton River Near Bridgewater affecting Bristol and Plymouth Counties. Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Massachusetts...Rhode Island... Shawsheen River At Andover affecting Essex County. Shawsheen River Near Wilmington affecting Essex and Middlesex Counties. Charles River At Dover affecting Norfolk and Middlesex Counties. Pawtuxet River At Cranston affecting Kent and Providence Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Connecticut... Farmington River At Unionville affecting Hartford County. .A widespread 2 to 4 inches of rain fell overnight along with rapid snowmelt. This has resulted in many rivers and stream going into flood or expected to go into flood within the next day or so. For the Farmington River...including Unionville, Simsbury, Tariffville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Sudbury River...including Saxonville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Shawsheen River...including Wilmington, Andover...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Blackstone River...including Northbridge, Woonsocket... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Charles River...including Dover...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Neponset River...including Norwood...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawtuxet River...including Scituate Reservoir, Cranston... Major flooding is forecast. For the Pawcatuck River...including Wood River Junction, Westerly... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Taunton River...including Bridgewater...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wood River...including Hope Valley...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pawcatuck River at Westerly. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Floodwaters approach lowest lying homes along Hiscox Road in Westerly. Along Route 3, flooding occurs at some homes in French Village in Hopkinton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 7.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM EST Wednesday was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 8.4 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 115 PM EST.
